pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister of Japan Shinzo Abe | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with the Prime Minister of Japan, Shinzo Abe. The two leaders welcomed the upcoming signing of the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), in Santiago, Chile, on March 8, and welcomed the new jobs and opportunities for the middle class that the Agreement stands to create. Both leaders reaffirmed their commitment to open and inclusive trade.
